Subject: Successful sign-in to your Microsoft account from a new location

Dear [User],

We are writing to inform you that a successful sign-in to your Microsoft account was detected from a new location. The sign-in occurred on [date] at [time] from the IP address [IP address] in [city], [country].

If you authorized this sign-in, you can disregard this message. However, if you did not initiate this sign-in or believe your account has been compromised, please take immediate action to secure your account.

As a precaution, we recommend changing your password and enabling two-step verification to add an extra layer of security to your account. You can do this by visiting the Security settings in your Microsoft account.

If you have any concerns or require further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact our support team. We are here to help ensure the security of your Microsoft account.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Sincerely,

The Microsoft Security Team
